title: FP91G
author: FP91G
content: The Airdrop⭐️ 50% of the supply of POM coin is allocated for ETH2.0 holder airdropsTo reward strong supporters of Proof Of Memes, a 10% airdrop bonus will be provided to wallets with zero sellsFor those who choose to sell any amount of ETH2.0 before the POM coin airdrop a 40% allocation reduction will be triggered. Interactions with any wallet with recorded ETH2.0 sells or transfers to a CEX which is then sent back to a DeFi wallet with a lower number of tokens will also trigger this reduction in POM coin allocationThe airdrop will be distributed to ETH2.0 holders on a vesting schedule with an initial 15% airdropped followed by 1% per day for 85 daysThe POM coin airdrop for ETH2.0 holders will be fully automated and no action is required to receive your POM on POMchainhttps://medium.com/@proof_of_memes/the-proof-of-memes-airdrop-bf31ea7dd9f7Author: Proof Of Memes
